properties.description: Recharge is a private enterprise SaaS company providing subscription management platforms for large brands; with 374 employees (+7.4% YoY growth), $41M annual revenue, founded in 2014, headquartered in Santa Monica, CA, and $554M in total funding. It specializes in ecommerce, subscriptions, payments, and automation, serving over 20,000 brands and competing with firms like Cybersource and Lightspeed.
properties.content:
Subscriptions & Recurring Payments for Ecommerce - Recharge

# The world’s leading subscription platform
Powering 71% of subscriptions sold on Shopify stores.
[Get started](#modal-custom-pricing)

## Built on three unshakeable pillars
The founding principles that have guided us from day one.
![Trophy icon](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/icons/trophy-lg.svg)
Hands-on partnership
More than a platform. Our team works directly with yours to manage and scale your subscription program.
[Learn moreabout a hands-on partnership with Recharge](#hands-on-partnership)
![Lightbulb icon](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/icons/lightbulb-lg.svg)
Relentless product innovation
No one ships faster. In the last year, we’ve launched over 150 products and updates to help you stay ahead.
[Learn moreabout relentless product innovation at Recharge](#relentless-product-innovation)
![Shield/check icon](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/icons/shield-check-lg.svg)
Proven performance
Over 100M subscribers. Built to perform at scale and trusted by the best in ecommerce.
[Learn moreabout the proven performance of Recharge](#proven-performance)
Hands-on partnership
## Guidance at every step
From migration to your next milestone, seamless onboarding and award-winning support help you hit every goal with confidence.
$1B+
Processed per month
95%+
Customer satisfaction
![First comment overlaying the laptop conference](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/guidance-at-every-step/comment-1.webp)![Second comment overlaying the laptop conference](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/guidance-at-every-step/comment-2.webp)![Laptop with four individuals sharing a conference call](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/guidance-at-every-step/laptop-conference.webp)![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/guidance-at-every-step/mobile/laptop-conference.webp)
Relentless product innovation
## Easily start, scale, and manage your subscription business
**10x faster innovation**, powered by the biggest team in subscription commerce.
Win them over
### Subscriptions
Turn shoppers into subscribers with no-code tools, predictive analytics, and churn prevention that keep customers from day one.
[Learn moreabout subscriptions powered by Recharge](/products/subscriptions/)
![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/start-scale-manage/win-them-over.webp)![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/start-scale-manage/mobile/win-them-over.webp)
Keep them coming back
### Loyalty
Drive loyalty through personalized rewards, referrals, and engagement tools built to keep your brand top of mind.
[Learn moreabout how Recharge fosters merchant loyalty](/products/retain/)
![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/start-scale-manage/keep-them-coming-back.webp)![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/start-scale-manage/mobile/keep-them-coming-back.webp)
Serve them better
### Support
Deliver service at scale with customizable portals, proactive order emails, and AI-powered Concierge SMS.
[Learn moreabout AI-powered Concierge SMS](/products/sms/)
![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/start-scale-manage/serve-them-better.webp)![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/start-scale-manage/mobile/serve-them-better.webp)
Proven performance
## Make more money on Recharge
With intelligent recommendations and data you can act on, Recharge helps you focus on what drives results.
11%
Higher subscriber conversion
3x
Increase in shopper LTV with Recharge
![](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/designed-to-outperform/recharge-insights-email.webp)
![Quip logo](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/quotes/logos/quip.svg)
“Recharge gives us a best-in-class solution with predictable spend, freeing up our resources and attention so we can focus on our core oral wellness mission.”
**Meredith Glansberg**CEO, quip
![Apothékary logo](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/quotes/logos/apothekary.svg)
“We value every partnership, but Recharge stands out for the exceptional customer value and hands-on support that show they truly prioritize our shared growth.”
**Shizu Okusa**Founder & CEO, Apothékary
![Example of the Noons Coffee interface for customizing a user's bundle](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/engineered-to-give-control/noons-customize-your-bundle.webp)
## Engineered to give you control
Unlock endless customizations with our robust API and SDK, empowering you to tailor every detail to match your one-of-a-kind subscription vision.
[Explore the docs](/developers/)
![Shopify x Recharge](/wp-content/themes/rechargepayments/assets/img/refresh/front/ecosystem/shopify-x-recharge.webp)
## Made for Shopify
$42B in GMV and counting. The most innovative Shopify brands run on Recharge.
[Learn moreabout the force multiplier of Shopify x Recharge](/ecommerce/shopify-subscriptions/)
## Backed by an ecosystem
Leverage a vast partner network to connect your business and optimize your subscription lifecycle.
[Agency partners](https://partners.getrecharge.com/)[Technology partners](/integrations/)
## Powering the leading brands in*every*vertical
Health & WellnessFood & BeverageBeauty & Personal CareHome & PetDigital SubscriptionsMeal Kits

company.name: Recharge
company.about:
In a world where acquisition costs are skyrocketing, funding is scarce, and ecommerce merchants are forced to do more with less, the most innovative DTC brands understand that subscription strategy is business strategy.

Recharge is simplifying retention and growth for innovative ecommerce brands. As the #1 subscription platform, Recharge is dedicated to empowering brands to easily set up and manage subscriptions, create dynamic experiences at every customer touchpoint, and continuously evaluate business performance. Powering everything from no-code customer portals to personalized offers and customizable bundles, Recharge helps merchants seamlessly manage, grow, and delight their subscribers while reducing operating costs and churn. Today, Recharge powers more than 20,000 merchants serving 100 million subscribers, including brands such as Blueland, Hello Bello, CrunchLabs, Chamberlain Coffee, and Bobbie.

Recharge doesn’t just help you sell products, we help build buyer routines that last.

Recharge is recognized on the Technology Fast 500, awarded by Deloitte (third consecutive year), and is Great Place to Work Certified.

evaluations.reasoning: The company has 374 employees, which falls within the required range of between 201 and 500

evaluations.criterion: Company is headquartered in the United States
evaluations.reasoning: The company is based in United States of America

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the Enterprise SaaS industry
evaluations.reasoning: Recharge provides a subscription management platform delivered via the cloud as a SaaS product. The company’s own "Enterprise" page explicitly targets large brands, highlights enterprise‑grade infrastructure, compliance (PCI, SOC2), dedicated account management, and support for high‑volume merchants. The internal company profile lists the product as a SaaS solution and categorizes it under "saas" and "subscriptions". Together, these indicate that Recharge operates in the Enterprise SaaS industry.
